title: Cant login
body: i cant log in. only shows logging on but nothing, about 5 minutes after i get error. my internet is fine i restarted router.... i have this problem for 2 days now.. i am using linux but game was just fine

replies.body: It sounds like you could be having a connection problem reaching our login servers.  Unfortunately, we don't currently support linux so I couldn't provide troubleshooting steps beyond suggesting our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  If you are able to troubleshoot your connection, then it's possible that you can get this resolved.  Best of luck!
